name: Vinay Johar
summary:
Summary
I started my career as technologies handlingbig queries, large EDI, And big data analyst. With time I got passioned by business And now I am perfect blend of Business And Technology.
Worked on projects like XML commerce, an EDI engine, for
eCommerce transactions, payloadz optimally searching 26 million products, stock market feeds, And now in HR Technology where we analyze more than 10 millions CV per month. Understand area of NLP, NER, Solr, Stanbol, Hadoop, talend, Zoie, Bobo, knime, Redefine, datasets And many more that enables Big Data analytic. And with good blend of latest happening in current like Graph databases, Neo4J, titan And various others.
